image:image.image:caption: Our Pressure Transducers allow technicians to monitor hydraulic and pneumatic pressure from up to 100m (328ft) away, safely and efficiently.
image:image.image:title: Pressure Transducer Wireless Sensor

image:image.image:caption: These kits can be configured with different pressure ranges to suit any applications.
image:image.image:title: Pressure Transducer Bluetooth Sensor

image:image.image:caption: The Dial Indicator is designed to remotely measure clearances, tolerances and wear on machine components safely and efficiently.
image:image.image:title: Dial Indicator Wireless Sensor

image:image.image:caption: Bluetooth Dial Indicator to measure the upper hoist pin movement and the nose cone movement on one of the 794'â€™'s.
image:image.image:title: Dial Indicator Bluetooth Sensor

image:image.image:caption: The Tachometer enables completely wireless RPM measurements (e.g the speed of fans, pumps, drill heads, and other rotating parts).
image:image.image:title: Tachometer Wireless Sensor

image:image.image:caption: The Tachometer enables completely wireless RPM measurements (e.g the speed of fans, pumps, drill heads, and other rotating parts).
image:image.image:title: Tachometer Bluetooth Sensor
